mapper.select: SELECT os_group.NAME_ FROM os_group LEFT JOIN os_dimension ON os_group.DIM_ID_ = os_dimension.DIM_ID_ WHERE os_dimension.DIM_KEY_ = '_ADMIN' AND os_group.CHILDS_ =0

SELECT project_plan.projectId, sum( project_stagedivide.stagePercent ) AS progressNum FROM project_plan LEFT JOIN project_stagedivide ON project_plan.stageId = project_stagedivide.stageId WHERE project_plan.projectId in
#{item}
AND (project_plan.actualEndTime is not null and project_plan.actualEndTime !='' and project_plan.actualEndTime <= #{queryEndTime})
AND (project_plan.actualEndTime is not null and project_plan.actualEndTime !='')
GROUP BY project_plan.projectId ORDER BY project_plan.projectId
select * from os_group where NAME_=#{deptName} and DIM_ID_='1'

SELECT project_baseinfo.projectId, MIN( project_plan.planEndTime ) AS planEndTime FROM project_baseinfo LEFT JOIN project_plan ON project_baseinfo.projectId = project_plan.projectId WHERE
project_baseinfo.projectId = #{projectId}
